mapper.sql: UID_ACTIVIDAD, TRIGGER_UID, TRIGGER_CODE, TRIGGER_DESCRIPTION, LAST_MOD_USER_ID, LAST_MOD_DATE, ACTION_UID, LAST_TRIGGER_EXEC_UID
mapper.select:
select
distinct
,
from LY_TRIGGERS_TBL TRG
order by ${orderByClause}

select
distinct
from LY_TRIGGERS_TBL TRG
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
insert into LY_TRIGGERS_TBL
UID_ACTIVIDAD,
TRIGGER_UID,
TRIGGER_CODE,
TRIGGER_DESCRIPTION,
LAST_MOD_USER_ID,
LAST_MOD_DATE,
ACTION_UID,
LAST_TRIGGER_EXEC_UID,
TRIGGER_DATA,
#{uidActividad,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{triggerUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{triggerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{triggerDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{lastModUserId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{lastModDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{actionUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{lastTriggerExecUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{triggerData,jdbcType=BLOB},
mapper.update:
update LY_TRIGGERS_TBL TRG
UID_ACTIVIDAD = #{record.uidActividad,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRIGGER_UID = #{record.triggerUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRIGGER_CODE = #{record.triggerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRIGGER_DESCRIPTION = #{record.triggerDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAST_MOD_USER_ID = #{record.lastModUserId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LAST_MOD_DATE = #{record.lastModDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ACTION_UID = #{record.actionUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAST_TRIGGER_EXEC_UID = #{record.lastTriggerExecUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRIGGER_DATA = #{record.triggerData,jdbcType=BLOB},

update LY_TRIGGERS_TBL TRG set UID_ACTIVIDAD = #{record.uidActividad,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRIGGER_UID = #{record.triggerUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRIGGER_CODE = #{record.triggerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRIGGER_DESCRIPTION = #{record.triggerDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAST_MOD_USER_ID = #{record.lastModUserId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LAST_MOD_DATE = #{record.lastModDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ACTION_UID = #{record.actionUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAST_TRIGGER_EXEC_UID = #{record.lastTriggerExecUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRIGGER_DATA = #{record.triggerData,jdbcType=BLOB}

update LY_TRIGGERS_TBL TRG set UID_ACTIVIDAD = #{record.uidActividad,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRIGGER_UID = #{record.triggerUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRIGGER_CODE = #{record.triggerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRIGGER_DESCRIPTION = #{record.triggerDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAST_MOD_USER_ID = #{record.lastModUserId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LAST_MOD_DATE = #{record.lastModDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ACTION_UID = #{record.actionUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAST_TRIGGER_EXEC_UID = #{record.lastTriggerExecUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update LY_TRIGGERS_TBL
TRIGGER_CODE = #{triggerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRIGGER_DESCRIPTION = #{triggerDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAST_MOD_USER_ID = #{lastModUserId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LAST_MOD_DATE = #{lastModDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ACTION_UID = #{actionUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAST_TRIGGER_EXEC_UID = #{lastTriggerExecUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRIGGER_DATA = #{triggerData,jdbcType=BLOB},
where UID_ACTIVIDAD = #{uidActividad,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and TRIGGER_UID = #{triggerUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select
distinct
,
from LY_TRIGGERS_TBL TRG
order by ${orderByClause}

select
distinct
from LY_TRIGGERS_TBL TRG
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.sql: TRG.UID_ACTIVIDAD, TRG.TRIGGER_UID, TRG.TRIGGER_CODE, TRG.TRIGGER_DESCRIPTION, TRG.TRIGGER_DATA, TRG.LAST_MOD_USER_ID, TRG.LAST_MOD_DATE, TRG.ACTION_UID, TRG.LAST_TRIGGER_EXEC_UID, TEXEC.TRIGGER_EXEC_UID AS TEXEC_TRIGGER_EXEC_UID, TEXEC.EXECUTION_ID AS TEXEC_EXECUTION_ID, TEXEC.START_DATE AS TEXEC_START_DATE, TEXEC.END_DATE AS TEXEC_END_DATE, TEXEC.USER_ID AS TEXEC_USER_ID, TEXEC.STATUS_ID AS TEXEC_STATUS_ID, TEXEC.STATUS_TEXT AS TEXEC_STATUS_TEXT, TEXEC.AFFECTED_RECORDS AS TEXEC_AFFECTED_RECORDS, TEXEC.LAST_ACC_EXECUTION_UID AS TEXEC_LAST_ACC_EXECUTION_UID, ACTION.ACTION_TYPE, ACTION.MANUAL_EXECUTION, ACTION.NEXT_EXECUTION_DATE, ACTION.TIME_INTERVAL, ACTION.CRON_INTERVAL, USERS.DESUSUARIO AS LAST_MOD_USER
mapper.select:
select
distinct
FROM LY_TRIGGERS_TBL TRG LEFT JOIN LY_TRIGGERS_EXEC_TBL TEXEC ON (TEXEC.UID_ACTIVIDAD = TRG.UID_ACTIVIDAD AND TEXEC.TRIGGER_EXEC_UID = TRG.LAST_TRIGGER_EXEC_UID) LEFT JOIN LY_ACTIONS_TBL ACTION ON (ACTION.UID_ACTIVIDAD = TRG.UID_ACTIVIDAD AND ACTION.ACTION_UID = TRG.ACTION_UID) INNER JOIN D_ACTIVIDADES_TBL ACT on (ACT.UID_ACTIVIDAD = TRG.UID_ACTIVIDAD) INNER JOIN D_USUARIOS_TBL USERS on (USERS.UID_INSTANCIA = ACT.UID_INSTANCIA and USERS.ID_USUARIO = TRG.LAST_MOD_USER_ID)
order by ${orderByClause}

select
, ACTION.ACTION_DATA FROM LY_TRIGGERS_TBL TRG LEFT JOIN LY_TRIGGERS_EXEC_TBL TEXEC ON (TEXEC.UID_ACTIVIDAD = TRG.UID_ACTIVIDAD AND TEXEC.TRIGGER_EXEC_UID = TRG.LAST_TRIGGER_EXEC_UID) LEFT JOIN LY_ACTIONS_TBL ACTION ON (ACTION.UID_ACTIVIDAD = TRG.UID_ACTIVIDAD AND ACTION.ACTION_UID = TRG.ACTION_UID) INNER JOIN D_ACTIVIDADES_TBL ACT on (ACT.UID_ACTIVIDAD = TRG.UID_ACTIVIDAD) INNER JOIN D_USUARIOS_TBL USERS on (USERS.UID_INSTANCIA = ACT.UID_INSTANCIA and USERS.ID_USUARIO = TRG.LAST_MOD_USER_ID) where TRG.UID_ACTIVIDAD = #{uidActividad,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and TRG.TRIGGER_UID = #{triggerUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
